Class Time

java.lang.Object
Time
public class Time extends Object
this class is mainly for providing a real clock for the whole flow of the simulation convention: everything is in minutes with 6:00Am as the starting reference an 10:00Pm as the last reference
Author:
Azeez + Ali + Ahmed
